item.title: Ukraine accuses Russia of undermining next round of peace talks
item.description: Russia says it is sending its negotiators to Turkey for a second round of ceasefire talks on 2 June.

item.title: How Bondi mass killer slipped through the cracks in Australia
item.description: An inquest is examining whether there were "missed opportunities" to stop Joel Cauchi's stabbing rampage.

item.title: Warning after 250 million bees escape overturned truck in US
item.description: Master bee-keepers are called to the scene after a truck containing 70,000 pounds of active honey bee hives flipped over.

item.title: US to double tariffs on steel and aluminium imports to 50%, Trump says
item.description: President Donald Trump says the increase in tariffs will protect America's steel industry, along with an expected partnership with Japan.

item.title: Shakira cancels second concert over production issues
item.description: The Colombian pop star says she is "devastated", after also cancelling her previous show in Boston.
